article.ArticleTitle: Tech Giant Invests Huge Money to Build a Computer Out of Science Fiction
article.ArticleText: The tech giant says it is ready to begin planning a quantum computer, a powerful cpu machine that relies on subatomic pArticleicles instead of transistors. A to još nije sve...

article.ArticleTitle: What if I don't want to use NetlifyCMS
article.ArticleText:
This tool is semantic and sooooooo cool, that I need to congratulate Lea Verou for her work. Really impressive.
I need to use this, it best web tool ever. This is future
Ovo je tako semantično pravilno i jednostavno, da me razveseljava sama pomisao, šta sve se može napraviti. Svakakva aplikacija, savakakav UI. Sky is the limit. Stvarno.
Ovo treba napraviti, jer ako neču ja, če netko drugi, definitivno... A tržište je ogromno i jako konkurentno.
